properties.areaDesc: Cleburne, AR; Lonoke, AR; Independence, AR; White, AR; Prairie, AR; Jackson, AR; Pulaski, AR; Woodruff, AR
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 12:08AM CST until January 11 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Northwestern Woodruff County in eastern Arkansas...
Southwestern Independence County in north central Arkansas...
Northern Prairie County in central Arkansas...
Southwestern Jackson County in eastern Arkansas...
Northern Lonoke County in central Arkansas...
Southeastern Cleburne County in north central Arkansas...
White County in central Arkansas...
Northeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas...

* Until 115 AM CST.

* At 1207 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from 7 miles west of Pleasant Plains to near Crosby to
near Beebe to Cabot, moving east at 30 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Jacksonville...                   Cabot...
Searcy...                         Newport...
Augusta...                        Des Arc...
Little Rock AFB...                Beebe...
Ward...                           Bald Knob...
Austin in Lonoke County...        Judsonia...
Kensett...                        Diaz...
Higginson...                      Pangburn...
Pleasant Plains...                Russell...
West Point...                     Barrettsville...

This includes US Highway 67 between mile markers 11 and 85.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for eastern,
central and north central Arkansas.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and flash
flooding may occur. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded
roadways.
